token.aboutHeadlineTextWeAre: We are a company specialized in
token.aboutHeadlineExecutive: executive private taxi services between the Guadalajara and Monterrey Airports, and any destination within those metropolitan areas—and other cities in the region—24 hours a day.
token.aboutMainDetailHeaderWeAppreciate: We appreciate and welcome your feedback and suggestions
token.aboutMainDetailTextANewCompany: A new company managed by personnel with more than a decade of experience. Qualified drivers and new units in excellent condition. With the best prices for online reservations or with the App.
token.aboutDetail1Text: Thanks to the valuable feedback from our clients and the commitment of our collaborators to improve, we continually adapt our processes to ensure your satisfaction.
token.aboutDetail2Text: We support sustainable transportation by adopting technologies that avoid congestion and empty trips. We select state-of-the-art models and apply preventive maintenance to reduce the environmental impact
token.aboutDetail3Text: For the selection of our personnel, we apply the most rigorous tests and filters in the industry. We periodically train in standards, navigation, communications and safety
token.aboutDetail4Text: We correspond to your preference by striving to offer the best transfer experience. Because our goal is to become your transfer company when traveling through the Monterrey and Guadalajara Airports
token.arrivalMainTextAirportTaxi: airport taxi service of ten companies is available 24 hours a day and the rates are calculated according to the area of ​​your destination. This is the safest and fastest way available from Monterrey Airport.
token.arrivalHowToHeader: How to get from Monterrey Airport to your destination?
token.arrivalHowToText1: When you arrive at the Monterrey Airport you will find different transportation options. Like the
token.arrivalHowToText5: public buses that take you to bus terminals and a
token.arrivalHowToText9: that take you to Saltillo and other cities in the region.
token.arrivalHowToText10: Metropolitan, app and pirate taxis are not supposed to pick up passengers at the Airport.
token.arrivalHowToText11: To move around the Airport, you can use the free bus service between terminals.
token.arrivalHowToText12: Watch out! The authorized transport only accepts reservations from the App, from this site or ticket from the ATMs located inside the airport.
token.arrivalAfterLandingOption1text: 1. Pass immigration 2. Collect your bags 3. Pass customs, 4. Walk to the main exit of the terminal, 5. Once outside.
token.arrivalAfterLandingOption2text: Cross the internal street and take your right to the space with the names of the taxi companies hanging from the ceiling (Taxi Stand). Outside the vehicle with the Ecofy logo will be your driver.
token.arrivalAfterLandingOption3text: When leaving the terminal, go diagonally to the right towards the covered walkway until you find the totem poles of the authorized taxi companies (Taxi Stand). Outside the vehicle with the Ecofy logo will be your driver.
token.arrivalAfterLandingOption4text: Cross the inner street from Gate 2 and turn left to the space with the names of the taxi companies hanging from the ceiling (Taxi Stand). Outside the vehicle with the Ecofy logo will be your driver.
token.arrivalGDLMainTextAirportTaxi: airport taxi service is available 24 hours a day from three companies:
token.arrivalGDLMainTextAirportTaxi5: , and Ecofy. Tariffs are calculated based on your destination zone. This is the safest, most comfortable, and fastest form of transportation available from Guadalajara Airport.
token.arrivalGDLHowToHeader: How to get from Guadalajara Airport to your destination?
token.arrivalGDLHowToText1: Upon arrival at Guadalajara Airport, you'll find several transportation options. These include the fixed-route van service or shuttle offered by
token.arrivalGDLHowToText12: buses that take you to the
token.arrivalGDLHowToText16: services offered by 10 companies are also available within the airport.
token.arrivalGDLHowToText18: Metropolitan taxis, app taxis, and pirate taxis are not supposed to pick up passengers at the airport.
token.arrivalGDLHowToText19: Caution! Authorized transportation only accepts reservations from the Ecofy Mx and
token.arrivalGDLHowToText21: apps, from this website, or tickets purchased at the counters located inside the airport.
token.arrivalGDLAfterLandingOption1text1: After passing through immigration, collecting your bags, and going through customs, you can purchase an authorized taxi ticket at the counter inside the baggage claim area. Alternatively, continue outside as indicated by the signs and purchase it at the counter located before the exit gate.
token.arrivalGDLAfterLandingOption1text2: Upon exiting, walk to the interior street to the space with the taxi company names hanging from the ceiling (Taxi Stand). Your driver will be standing outside the vehicle with the Ecofy logo.
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion1: How do I get a quote?
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion2: Are the fees gross or net?
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion3: Are the rates per passenger or per vehicle?
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion3Answer: Prices are set by type of vehicle and distance. Within its maximum passenger and luggage capacity.
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion4: Can you drop off or pick-up passengers at more than one point?
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion4Answer: Yes, the base fare is from a single point of origin to a single point of destination. A charge is made for each extra address to pick up or drop off passengers.
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion5: Can you take us to a supermarket or restaurant before going to our hotel?
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion5Answer: Our driver can make a quick 5-minute stop at a convenience store on the way to your hotel at no extra cost. For a stop at a supermarket or restaurant, the cost per hour is MXP$375 by car and MXP$675 by van, and we ask that you request it when booking. Usually, one hour is enough.
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion6: Can I choose the toll highway route?
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion6Answer: Of course. The costs of toll highways, international bridges and parking lots are not included in the transportation rate.
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion7: Should I tip the driver? how much should I give
token.faqQuoteTextQuestion7Answer: It is optional and depends on how you value the service received. The driver should not ask for it.
token.faqPaymentMethodsTextQuestion1Answer: You can pay by credit or debit card, transfer or cash. We accept US dollars (USD) in bills, and where appropriate, we give the change in national currency (MXP). Check our exchange rate of the day. We do not accept traveler's checks.
token.faqPaymentMethodsTextQuestion2: Who do I pay, how and when?
token.faqPaymentMethodsTextQuestion2Answer1: With a card when booking through the
token.faqPaymentMethodsTextQuestion2Answer6: With transfer in advance to the following account:
token.faqPaymentMethodsTextQuestion2Answer7: Please send your voucher -by mail or networks- well in advance of the reserved departure date and time.
token.faqPaymentMethodsTextQuestion3: Can I pay with my card to book for someone else?
token.faqPaymentMethodsTextQuestion3Answer: Yes, you can use your card to pay for services of other passengers.
token.faqPaymentMethodsTextQuestion4: What is the next step after payment?
token.faqPaymentMethodsTextQuestion4Answer7: , you will receive a confirmation email.
token.faqPaymentMethodsTextQuestion4Answer8: If you paid by transfer after booking by
token.faqPaymentMethodsTextQuestion4Answer13: -and before the date and time of departure- we will confirm the payment received by the same means.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion1Answer10: By phone 24 hours a day at MTY
token.faqBookingTextQuestion1Answer13: You can pay by card in options 1 and 2, only.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion1Answer14: With advance transfer or cash on board in all options.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion2: How far in advance of the pick-up time should I book my transfer?
token.faqBookingTextQuestion2Answer1: In arrivals (landing) you can order the taxi at any time.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion2Answer2: On departures (take off) you can request a taxi 60 minutes before your preferred pickup time in the metropolitan area.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion3: How far in advance of my flight time should I request the pick-up time?
token.faqBookingTextQuestion3Answer1: In arrivals you can use the landing time plus 20 minutes as the pick-up time.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion3Answer2: For greater security, in the metropolitan area we can pick you up 60 minutes before the time the airline asks you to arrive before the flight.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion3Answer3: If an unforeseen event (street works, accident, breakdowns, bad weather, etc.) prevents us from arriving at the scheduled time to pick you up or delays or stops us taking you to the airport, we will let you know, so that you can move on your own or change your flight. In no case will we reimburse the cost of flights or expenses derived from their loss.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion4: Can I change or cancel my reservation?
token.faqBookingTextQuestion4Answer1: You can change or cancel your arrival (landing) reservation at any time up to the pick-up time. In services to the Airport (departure), from the metropolitan area up to one hour before the pick-up time.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion4Answer2: Changes and cancellations can be made through the same means you made your reservation.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion4Answer3: If you do not cancel or change within these time limits, or do not show up, there is no refund.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion5: What happens if my flight is delayed or advanced?
token.faqBookingTextQuestion5Answer: You will not have to deal with extra charges due to the delay or cancellation of your flight. In the event of a change of itinerary - request the modification of your reservation in a timely manner - and you will find a new driver just as you leave the terminal at your new arrival time.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion6: How do I know you have my reservation?
token.faqBookingTextQuestion6Answer1: By the means you book you receive confirmation.
token.faqBookingTextQuestion6Answer2: Additionally, we send you an email.
token.faqInvoiceTextQuestion1: How do I get my invoice?
token.faqInvoiceTextQuestion1Answer1: Get your invoice right away on this
token.faqInvoiceTextQuestion1Answer3: You can bill after the end of the service. You can only invoice those of the same month.
token.faqInvoiceTextQuestion2: What is my service number to invoice?
token.faqInvoiceTextQuestion2Answer: On the MTY atm ticket, these are the 21 digits in the last row that only have numbers. On the GDL booth ticket, these are the digits after Ticket #. And on the reservation receipt you receive by mail, these are the nine digits in the first row.
token.faqInvoiceTextQuestion3: How do I request assistance to generate my invoice?
token.faqInvoiceTextQuestion3Answer1: Please send us an email to
token.faqInvoiceTextQuestion3Answer2: with: (1) Image of your ticket or reservation, (2) Proof of updated Tax Status, and (3) If you paid by card, please include whether it was credit or debit. And we will send it to you the next business day.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion1: What kind of vehicles do you use?
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion1Answer: We use Toyota Corolla, Prius, Yaris S, Avanza and Hiace vans. All of recent models equipped with seat belts and air conditioning.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion2: How many passengers and how much luggage can fit in your vehicles?
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion2Answer: Sedan cars (Prius and Yaris) can carry up to 4 passengers of any age*, 4 regular-size pieces of luggage (up to 55 Lbs) that can be transported in their trunk space, and 4 carry-on bags. Vans (Hiace) can carry up to 11 passengers of any age*, each with one regular-sized piece of luggage (up to 55 Lbs) and one carry-on. *Minimum one adult.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion3: What are the extra or special baggage restrictions? Is there an extra charge?
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion3Answer1: There is no extra charge for additional or special baggage as long as it fits in the space designated for it and is stored safely.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion3Answer2: In case you travel with a stroller, baby seat, wheelchair, musical instruments, sports equipment, etc.; We recommend reserving a van so that you have the necessary space. Take the protective case for your equipment. Ecofy will not reimburse any damage to baggage during loading or transfer.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion4: I am traveling with children. Do you provide child seats?
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion4Answer1: We have two types of child seats - at no additional cost - subject to availability:
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion4Answer4: It is the responsibility of the adult passenger to install the seat and fasten the seat belt following the manufacturer's instructions:
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion5: How can I travel with Service Animals (SVAN), Emotional Support Animals (ESAN) and Other Pets?
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion5Answer1: We can transport dogs that support people who are blind or have low vision, deafness, motor disabilities or seizures. And dogs and cats that provide therapeutic support to their guardian through affection and company.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion5Answer2: Bring proof of your pet's SVAN or ESAN status.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion5Answer3: At all times the animal must be on your lap, or at your feet; with collar and leash or harness. For no reason may it be placed in the seats intended for customers, even if they are empty.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion5Answer4: As a passenger, you are in charge of the animal on board the vehicle, including cleaning if necessary and compensating for any damage it may cause. It is not permitted to provide food or liquids to animals on board the vehicle.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion5Answer5: Maximum two animals per vehicle. Only one of them can be SVAN or ESAN. Other pets require remaining in a carrier during travel. The kennel-type container must have a leak-proof floor and maximum dimensions of 120 x 110 x 90 cms (length x width x height) or 319 linear cms (length + width + height). Medium or large dog only in van.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion5Answer6: We do not accept pregnant females, animals less than 8 weeks old, sedated, sick, dead, or breeds considered dangerous or aggressive.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion5Answer7: If your pet shows aggressive or nervous behaviors such as sudden movements, chewing or scratching excessively, for its safety, it will not be able to travel.
token.faqVehiclesTextQuestion5Answer8: This service does not generate additional charges.
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion1: Where do I find you at the airport?
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion1Answer1: A driver will wait for you outside the vehicle with the Ecofy logo at the authorized taxi stand that is located across the internal street outside the main exit of each terminal, after you have passed immigration, collected your luggage and cleared customs.
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion1Answer2: We always have a logo on our vehicles, our drivers are outside the terminal and only accept reservations from the
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion1Answer6: or tickets from the ATMs located inside the airport. Watch out! Metropolitan, app and pirate taxis are not supposed to pick up passengers at the Airport.
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion2: Will someone be waiting for me at the airport with my name?
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion2Answer: If you are a foreigner, when booking it can be agreed that the driver will meet you at arrivals with your name.
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion3: I can't find you. How can I contact you from the airport?
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion3Answer1: Locate and contact the driver of your assigned taxi on this
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion3Answer5: . You can also contact us by
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion4: How long do I have to wait at the airport for my vehicle?
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion4Answer5: , you do not have to queue at the taxi ATMs. Go directly to the authorized taxi stand.
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion4Answer6: Under normal conditions you will never have to wait more than 25 minutes to be on your way to your hotel.
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion4Answer7: Which is the time it takes for the driver to get from his assigned place inside the airport to the taxi stand, plus the boarding time of the passengers who arrived before you.
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion5: Do I need to present my reservation?
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion5Answer2: Show him the screen of this
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion5Answer6: where it indicates that your vehicle is the one assigned to you, or
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion5Answer7: Inform the reservation number you received on social networks or call, or
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion6Answer14: Estimated times in normal conditions, without rain or unforeseen events.
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion7: I forgot belongings in the vehicle, what can I do?
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion7Answer1: Contact us by the means available through this same
token.faqCustomerServiceTextQuestion7Answer3: and we will respond as soon as possible. In no case will we reimburse costs of forgotten objects or expenses derived from their loss.
token.faqATMTicketTextQuestion1: How do I change or cancel the ticket I bought at the airport terminal?
token.faqATMTicketTextQuestion1Answer1: In Guadalajara, please go to the counter where you made the purchase.
token.faqATMTicketTextQuestion1Answer2: In Monterrey, go to the ATM operator's counter, located inside each terminal

token.homeStepsTextRequestTrip1: Choose the service that best suits your needs, whether it is a one way or round trip. Individual or for groups.
token.homeStepsTextRequestTrip2: Our commitment is to offer you the most complete service.
token.homeStepstextTravel1: Our goal is to offer you the ideal transportation option when you visit our city.
token.homeStepstextTravel2: Arrive as soon as possible -with the comfort you deserve- at your hotel in the metropolitan area, or in nearby tourist destinations.
token.homeStepsTextEnjoy1: By acquiring your service with us, you can be sure of obtaining the best quality service.
token.homeStepsTextEnjoy2: From the moment of your reservation, we will do everything we can to ensure that your trip runs as smoothly as possible.
token.homeAboutText1: Welcome. We are an authorized executive taxi company serving the Guadalajara (GDL) and Monterrey (MTY) Airports.
token.homeAboutText2: We take care in every detail to offer you the best experience.
token.homeAboutText3: We provide private, safe and reliable transportation between the airports and any destination in the metropolitan areas of Guadalajara, Monterrey, Saltillo and other cities in the region at all hours.
token.homeAboutText4: With unique prices when booking with the App or online with us, right now.
token.homeAboutText5: Travel with our team of experienced drivers, trained to answer any questions or needs during your transfer, and with extensive knowledge of the local area. Some are bilingual and all of them offer you a friendly and professional treatment. We guarantee exceptional service to every client.
token.homeAboutText6: Enjoy a trip in new Toyota brand cars and vans, tailored for the number of passengers and luggage you specify, with traveler and civil liability insurance above the mandatory, air conditioning, updated communication, navigation and location technology.
token.homeInterestTextExplore: Explore popular destinations in Monterrey, Guadalajara, and surrounding areas.
token.homeBenefitsTextWhyBook: Why book your transportation in Monterrey with us?
token.homeBenefitsDetailText1: Access the best rates only for customers who book with the App or online on this page and save. Avoid the line to buy your ticket or surprises with dynamic rates.
token.homeBenefitsDetailText2: You can pay for your reservation by transfer, by card, or choose to pay in cash when traveling. Generate your invoice online instantly, as soon as the service ends.
token.homeBenefitsDetailHeader3: No fees for changes or cancellations
token.homeBenefitsDetailText3: You will not have to deal with extra charges due to the delay or cancellation of your flight. If you change your itinerary -modify your reservation in a timely manner and that's it- you will meet your driver at your new arrival time.
token.homeBenefitsDetailText4: All our services are private and direct, without intermediate stops or unknown passengers. Just you and your companions traveling directly to your destination.
token.homeBenefitsDetailText5: Hire a bilingual driver to wait for you and greet you at arrivals with your name. No lines, no waiting to board. That takes you on toll highways, etc.
token.homeBenefitsDetailText6: We also welcome corporate clients, hotels and travel platforms. We will be happy to offer you unique booking facilities, or connection to your platform (API).
token.homeReserveHeaderEnjoy: Enjoy the BEST experience with ECOFY
token.homeReserveTextIdentofy: Identify, know the arrival time and locate your driver from when he is on his way to pick you up.
token.homeReserveTextDontQueue: Don't queue to pay. Pay by card or transfer upon request, or in cash on board.
token.invoiceFormText1: You can invoice your trip after completion, within the same month.
token.invoiceFormText2: Before filling out the form, please read the instructions and notices found in the help icons and below the form in 'About Invoicing'.
token.invoiceFormFieldServiceTooltip: On the ATM ticket the service number is the 15 digits of the last row that only has numbers. In reservation it is the 9 digits of the first row labeled ‘Recibo #’.
token.invoiceFormFieldTaxNameTooltip: If it is a company, the name does not carry the initials of the type of company (SA de CV, AC, SAPI, etc.).
token.invoiceFormFieldEmailTooltip: The PDF and XML documents will be sent to this email, verify that it is written correctly. If your email does not arrive, check your spam folder and mark it as trustworthy for future emails.
token.invoiceFormFieldConfirmEmailError: 'Email' and 'Confirm Email' must be the same.
token.invoiceAboutText1: Have your reservation receipt, ATM ticket, and your most recent Tax Status Certificate (or the data it contains) ready.
token.invoiceAboutText2: The service number on your reservation receipt is the nine digits on the first line. On an ATM ticket, it's the 15 digits on the last line that contains only numbers.
token.invoiceAboutText3: According to SAT (Tax Authorities) rules, version 4.0 requires that the information entered to prepare your invoice coincide with the most up-to-date Constancia de Situación Fiscal (Proof of Fiscal Situation).
token.invoiceAboutText4: It is a form that issues the SAT at no cost. If you still do not have it -before continuing-
token.invoiceAboutText6: or ask it to your company's accounting or human resources department.
token.invoiceAboutText7: Fill in the fields of the template with the data of your company,
token.invoiceAboutText9: as they come in the Constancia. For example, if it is a company, the name does
token.invoiceAboutText11: carry the initials of the type of company (SA de CV, AC, SAPI, etc.). Similarly, the abbreviations, spaces and punctuation must be the same.
token.invoiceAboutText12: Please carefully review the data entered before requesting the invoice. Once drawn up, no cancellations or replacements are made.
token.invoiceAboutText13: You can prepare your invoice within the same month that the service was provided.
token.invoiceAboutText14: If you receive an error message, it can be for two main reasons:
token.invoiceAboutText15: Wrong wording of data. In this case, you just have to compare what you captured with your ticket and/or constancia, correct the wording and resubmit, or
token.invoiceAboutText16: Get an updated constancia, since the data entered is not current in the SAT database.
token.invoiceAboutText17: If you are a foreigner, you do not need a constancia. Use the generic RFC (federal taxpayer registration): XEXX010101000, Postal tax code: 66629, tax regime: No Tax Obligations.
token.invoiceAboutText18: The terrestrial public transport service of people is exempt from IVA (value added tax).
token.invoiceAttendanceText1: If you prefer additional assistance to generate your invoice, please send us an email to
token.invoiceAttendanceText3: Image of your ATM ticket or reservation receipt.
token.invoiceAttendanceText4: Your tax information: RFC, name, postal code, tax regime and payment method; or if you prefer, attach your updated Tax Status Certificate and we will take the data from it.
token.invoiceAttendanceText5: If you paid by card, please include whether it was credit or debit.
token.invoiceAttendanceText6: And we will send it to you the next business day.
token.primeService1Text: If you are a foreigner, if it is your first time in the city, or you simply want to have the most complete transportation service from the Airport.

token.primeService2Text2: The Prime service rate is double the current regular App rate.
token.primeService2Text3: Only card payment in the App or advance transfer.
token.primeService2Text4: Fees apply for additional waiting after 30 minutes, for late cancellation, or no show.
token.primeService2Text5: Prepare your invoice on our site at the end of your trip.

token.primeService3Text2: Driver waiting from landing, first 30 minutes free of charge.
token.primeService3Text3: Reception at arrivals with sign (Meet & greet).
token.primeService3Text4: From there directly to your vehicle, without lines or waiting.
token.primeService3Text5: Driver and vehicle assignment from the moment you reserve.
token.primeService3Text7: Direct communication with the driver from the moment you land.
token.primeService3Text8: Highway tolls and parking fees, if applicable.
token.primeService4Text: You can also hire the hourly rental service with a driver, to take you to all your appointments during your visit to the city
token.privacyText: This Privacy Policy establishes the terms in which Ecofy uses and protects the information that is provided by its users when using its website. This company is committed to the security of its users' data. When we ask you to fill in the personal information fields with which you can be identified, we do so by ensuring that it will only be used in accordance with the terms of this document. However, this Privacy Policy may change over time or be updated, so we recommend and emphasize that you continually review this page to ensure that you agree with such changes.
token.privacy1Text: Our website may collect personal information such as: Name, contact information such as your email address and demographic information. Likewise, when necessary, specific information may be required to process an order or make a delivery or billing.
token.privacy2Text1: Our website uses the information in order to provide the best possible service, particularly to keep a record of users, of orders, if applicable, and to improve our products and services. It is possible that periodic emails are sent through our site with special offers, new products and other advertising information that we consider relevant to you or that may provide you with some benefit, these emails will be sent to the address you provide and may be canceled. anytime.
token.privacy2Text2: Ecofy is highly committed to fulfilling the commitment to keep your information safe. We use the most advanced systems and constantly update them to ensure that there is no unauthorized access.
token.privacy3Text1: A cookie refers to a file that is sent in order to request permission to be stored on your computer, by accepting said file it is created, and the cookie then serves to have information regarding web traffic, and also facilitates future visits to a website. recurrent. Another function that cookies have is that with them the websites can recognize you individually and therefore provide you with the best personalized service on their website.
token.privacy3Text2: Our website uses cookies to be able to identify the pages that are visited and their frequency. This information is used solely for statistical analysis and then the information is permanently deleted. You can delete cookies at any time from your computer. However, cookies help provide a better service on websites, they do not give access to information on your computer or you, unless you want it and provide it directly. You can accept or deny the use of cookies, however most browsers automatically accept cookies as it serves to have a better web service. You can also change your computer settings to decline cookies. If they are declined, you may not be able to use some of our services.
token.privacy4Text1: This website may contain links to other sites that may be of interest to you. Once you click on these links and leave our page, we no longer have control over the site to which you are redirected and therefore we are not responsible for the terms or privacy or the protection of your data on those other third-party sites. These sites are subject to their own privacy policies, so it is recommended that you consult them to confirm that you agree with them.
token.privacy5Text1: At any time you can restrict the collection or use of personal information that is provided to our website. Every time you are asked to fill in a form, such as the user registration form, you can check or uncheck the option to receive information by email. If you have marked the option to receive our newsletter or advertising, you can cancel it at any time.
token.privacy5Text2: This company will not sell, assign or distribute personal information that is collected without your consent, unless required by a judge with a court order.
token.privacy5Text3: Ecofy reserves the right to change the terms of this Privacy Policy at any time.
token.termsAndConditionsText1: This website is operated by Ecofy. Throughout the site, the terms "we", "us" and "our" refer to Ecofy. Ecofy offers this website, including all information, tools and services available from this site to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies and notices stated here.
token.termsAndConditionsText2: By visiting our site and/or purchasing something from us, you participate in our "Service" and agree to the following terms and conditions ("Terms of Service", "Terms"), including any additional terms and conditions and policies to which referenced herein and/or available via hyperlinks. These Terms of Service apply to all users of the site, including without limitation users who are browsers, vendors, customers, merchants, and/or contributors of content.
token.termsAndConditionsText3: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before accessing or using our website. By accessing or using any part of the site, you are agreeing to the Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this Agreement, then you should not access the Website or use any Services.
